body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good morning! My name is Jose Kelly and I am with the Shoe Repair Service Customer Support. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, hello. My name is Christina Baker.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christina. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I had an issue with the customer service I received yesterday, and I'm feeling quite nervous about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm very sorry to hear that you're feeling this way, Christina. To better assist you, could I get your order number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And for verification purposes, could you please provide your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's April twenty-third, one nine eight zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that, Christina. Let me look into your query right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I really appreciate it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I'm here to help. I'll do my best to resolve your problem.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It looks like I was able to identify the issue. We will rectify this immediately.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's great to hear. Thank you so much for your help, Jose.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Christina. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. If there's anything else I can do for you, please don't hesitate to ask.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Will do. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christina. You as well! Have a wonderful day and take care.
